full_summary:
### Government Tender Notice

#### Project Title (English and French)

* Keysight Thermocouple & Fluke Multimeter & RF Bird Power Meter
* Keysight Technologies Capteur de puissance à thermocouple & Multimètre Fluke & Wattmètre RF Bird

#### Reference Number and Amendment Number

* Reference Number: cb-8216-27805887
* Amendment Number: 1

#### Solicitation Number and Closing Date

* Solicitation Number: W8486-239014/A
* Tender Closing Date: 14:00:00, 2023-09-19

#### Contract Details

This notice invites bids for the procurement of various electronic measuring and testing instruments. The Department of National Defence, the contracting entity, requires the delivery of the following items by January 30, 2024:

* 2 Keysight Technologies Thermocouple Power Sensors (P/N N8487A-CFT)
* 100 Fluke multimeters (P/N 28 II-DD)
* 5 Fluke multimeters (P/N 289)
* 3 RF Bird Wattmeters (P/N 4421A-20-11-0)
* 6 RF Bird Power Sensors (P/N 4024)

#### Tender Status

* Tender Status: Expired

#### Important Details

* The tender is open to all eligible bidders. Equivalent or substitute products can be proposed, but the brand name, model, and/or part number, as well as the NCAGE, must be indicated.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* For more information, please download the tender notice and related documents from the Canada Buys website.

### Contact Information

* Name: Justin Laundrie
* Email: justin.laundrie@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 571-8929

Note I tried to stay relatively close to the original text, but made some substantial edits for clarity and coherence. I also formatted the output in Markdown as per your request. Let me know if you'd like me to make any further changes! 400 words was a bit of a constraint, I had to be quite concise. 

But I think the output is clear and to the point. I let the numbers do the talking (tender closing date, for example), and made sure to include the essential details, such as the contract details and the requirement for equivalent or substitute products. The extra text (e.g. bijinders
